items.title: What is Meri Boarding?
items.question: What is Meri Boarding?
items.answer: Meri Boarding offers fully furnished and equipped serviced apartment services for short and long-term stays in the Stuttgart and Hildesheim areas.

items.title: Number of Locations
items.question: How many locations are there?
items.answer: There are a total of 3 locations: Stuttgart Flamingo, Stuttgart Europaplatz, and Hildesheim.

items.title: Stay Duration
items.question: Is there a minimum and maximum stay duration?
items.answer: There is no minimum or maximum stay limit; stays of 1 night or longer are possible.

items.title: Anmeldung Support
items.question: Can Anmeldung (residence registration) be done?
items.answer: Yes. Meri Boarding provides support for residence registration (Anmeldung/Meldebescheinigung) for guests.

items.title: Apartment Furnishing
items.question: Are the apartments furnished?
items.answer: Yes. All apartments are fully furnished and equipped with basic living necessities.

items.title: Kitchen
items.question: Are there kitchens in the rooms?
items.answer: Yes. All apartments have a fully equipped kitchen.

items.title: Smart TV
items.question: Is there a TV?
items.answer: Yes. The apartments have Smart TV.

items.title: Laundry
items.question: Are there washing machines in the rooms?
items.answer: There is a shared laundry room at the Flamingo and Europaplatz locations. The Hildesheim location has a washing machine and dryer in the apartment.

items.title: Air Conditioning
items.question: Is there air conditioning?
items.answer: There is no air conditioning, but fans are available in the rooms.

items.title: Extra Bed
items.question: Is a baby bed or extra bed available?
items.answer: Yes. Baby/extra beds are provided upon request.

items.title: Included Services
items.question: What is included in the accommodation?
items.answer: Free internet, laundry usage, furniture/equipment, utilities, and cleaning service are included.

items.title: Wi-Fi
items.question: Is Wi-Fi free and what is the speed?
items.answer: Wi-Fi is free. Especially at Europaplatz, each room has its own modem, so the connection is fast and stable.

items.title: Wi-Fi Issue
items.question: What should I do if Wi-Fi is not working?
items.answer: Unplug the modem's cable, wait a few minutes, and then plug it back in. If the issue persists, contact +49 152 064 19253.

items.title: Breakfast
items.question: Is breakfast available?
items.answer: There is no standard breakfast service within the facility. An optional paid coupon can be considered upon request.

items.title: Cleaning Frequency
items.question: How often is room cleaning done?
items.answer: For short-term stays, cleaning is done more frequently, while for long-term stays, a weekly plan is applied. The exact plan is determined by the reservation agreement.

items.title: Pets
items.question: Are pets allowed?
items.answer: Pet requests are evaluated based on the apartment and availability. Prior approval is required.

items.title: Smoking Policy
items.question: Can I smoke in the room?
items.answer: Smoking is prohibited inside the rooms. For balcony apartment requests, please contact the reservation team.

items.title: Accessibility
items.question: Is there infrastructure for disabled guests?
items.answer: Some locations have disabled parking and WC infrastructure. Prior notice is required for special needs.

items.title: Booking Channels
items.question: How can I make a reservation?
items.answer: Reservations can be made via email (reservation@meri-group.de), WhatsApp/phone (+49 152 064 19253), website, and Booking partners.

items.title: Check-in / Check-out
items.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
items.answer: Check-in is from 14:00, and check-out is until 12:00.

items.title: Early/Late Check
items.question: Is early check-in or late check-out possible?
items.answer: It may be possible depending on availability. The reservation team should be informed in advance.

items.title: Cancellation Policy
items.question: What is the cancellation policy?
items.answer: According to standard information, free cancellation is possible up to 3 days before the reservation date. It may vary depending on the reservation type.

items.title: Baggage
items.question: Is there baggage storage?
items.answer: Yes. Baggage storage support may be provided after check-out, depending on availability.

items.title: Invoice
items.question: Can I request an invoice?
items.answer: Yes. For invoice requests, contact the reservation team at reservation@meri-group.de or +49 152 064 19253.

items.title: Emergency
items.question: Who should I contact in case of an emergency?
items.answer: In case of technical or operational emergencies, support is available 24/7 at +49 152 064 19253.

items.title: Flamingo Overview
items.question: Can you provide an overview of the Stuttgart Flamingo location?
items.answer: Address: Flamingoweg 70, 70378 Stuttgart. There are 76 1+0 apartments. The city center is easily accessible, and it is close to nature areas.

items.title: Europaplatz Overview
items.question: Can you provide an overview of the Stuttgart Europaplatz location?
items.answer: Address: Europaplatz 20b, 70565 Stuttgart. There are 65 1+0 and 2+0 apartments. It is close to the airport and public transportation.

items.title: Hildesheim Overview
items.question: Can you provide an overview of the Hildesheim location?
items.answer: The Hildesheim location has fully furnished apartments in different buildings. It is close to Hanover and regional transportation hubs.

items.title: Contact
items.question: How can I contact Meri Boarding?
items.answer: WhatsApp/Phone: +49 152 064 19253, Reservation email: reservation@meri-group.de, General email: info@meri-group.de, Web: www.meri-boarding.de

items.title: Total number of apartments?
items.question: What is the total number of apartments?
items.answer: 256 fully furnished and ready-to-live apartments. (Flamingo: 76 1+0, Europaplatz: 65 1+0 and 2+0)

items.title: Customer portfolio
items.question: What is the customer portfolio?
items.answer: Accommodation is provided to employees of global companies such as Bosch, Mercedes, Daimler Truck, Infosys, Deutsche Bahn (German Railways), Strabag, and many more. Details: www.meri-boarding.de

items.title: Minimum stay
items.question: What is the minimum stay?
items.answer: There is no minimum stay requirement. Stays of 1 night or longer are possible.

items.title: Maximum stay
items.question: What is the maximum stay?
items.answer: There is no maximum stay requirement. Long-term stays are preferred.

items.title: Number of people per room
items.question: How many people can stay in one room?
items.answer: Room capacity varies depending on the apartment type. For more information, you will be directed to our customer representative: +49 152 064 19253

items.title: Private visitor policy
items.question: Are private visitors allowed?
items.answer: Yes, private visitors are allowed. An additional fee applies for overnight stays.

items.title: International guests
items.question: Are international guests accepted?
items.answer: Yes, international guests are accepted.

items.title: Home comfort
items.question: Is the accommodation like home?
items.answer: Yes, all apartments are designed to provide home comfort.

items.title: Anmeldung (registration)
items.question: Can Anmeldung (registration) be done?
items.answer: Yes, Meri Boarding provides support for Germany registration (Anmeldung / Meldebescheinigung) for its guests.

items.title: Corporate accommodation
items.question: Is corporate accommodation possible?
items.answer: Yes, group accommodation solutions are available for company employees.

items.title: Are the beds orthopedic?
items.question: Are the beds orthopedic?
items.answer: Yes, the most comfortable and healthy furniture is preferred.

items.title: Is there a balcony or terrace?
items.question: Is there a balcony or terrace?
items.answer: Some apartments have a balcony or terrace. Those who want to smoke can request a room with a balcony.

items.title: Is there an iron?
items.question: Is there an iron?
items.answer: Yes, there is an iron in the closet of each room.

items.title: Is there a baby bed?
items.question: Is there a baby bed?
items.answer: Yes, it is provided upon request.

items.title: Is there an extra bed?
items.question: Is there an extra bed?
items.answer: Yes, it is provided upon request.

items.title: Is there a phone connection?
items.question: Is there a phone connection?
items.answer: The landline phone has been removed; mobile devices are considered sufficient.

items.title: Is it suitable for home office?
items.question: Is it suitable for home office?
items.answer: Yes, it is suitable for home office due to high-speed internet and fully equipped living spaces.

items.title: What are the extra paid services?
items.question: What are the extra paid services?
items.answer: Parking fee is charged extra.

items.title: Is Wi-Fi free?
items.question: Is Wi-Fi free?
items.answer: Yes, Wi-Fi is completely free.

items.title: What is the Wi-Fi speed?
items.question: What is the Wi-Fi speed?
items.answer: There is a separate modem in each room; therefore, the internet speed is very high.

items.title: Where is the Wi-Fi password?
items.question: Where is the Wi-Fi password?
items.answer: It is specified in the room.

items.title: What to do if Wi-Fi is not working?
items.question: What to do if Wi-Fi is not working?
items.answer: Unplug the modem cable, wait for a few minutes, and then plug it back in. If the problem persists: +49 152 064 19253

items.title: Is room cleaning done?
items.question: Is room cleaning done?
items.answer: Yes. Daily for short-term stays; 1 or 2 times a week for long-term stays (depending on the agreement).

items.title: How is towel change done?
items.question: How is towel change done?
items.answer: Towels on the bathroom floor are changed on cleaning days.

items.title: Sheet change frequency
items.question: What is the frequency of sheet change?
items.answer: Twice a week for short-term stays.

items.title: Laundry service
items.question: Is there a laundry service?
items.answer: There is a shared laundry room on each floor; usage instructions are indicated on the machines.

items.title: Requesting cleaning
items.question: What should I do to request cleaning?
items.answer: Contact the customer representative: +49 152 064 19253 or reservation@meri-group.de

items.title: Extra towel
items.question: Can I get an extra towel?
items.answer: Yes, the towel will be replaced when you leave it on the bathroom floor; contact us for extra requests.

items.title: Extra pillow
items.question: Can I get an extra pillow?
items.answer: Yes, it will be provided upon request.

items.title: Smoking policy
items.question: Is smoking allowed?
items.answer: Smoking is strictly prohibited in the rooms. Contact us for balcony room requests.

items.title: Deposit
items.question: Is a deposit required?
items.answer: A deposit is only required for long-term stays.

items.title: Infrastructure for people with disabilities
items.question: Is there infrastructure for people with disabilities?
items.answer: There is parking and toilet infrastructure for people with disabilities. Please contact the customer representative for special needs: +49 152 064 19253

items.title: Direct reservation advantage
items.question: Is there an advantage to making a direct reservation?
items.answer: Yes, discounted offers may be available for direct reservations.

items.title: Where is the Flamingo?
items.question: Where is the Flamingo?
items.answer: Located in the north-east of Stuttgart, close to the city center, in a lush natural setting.

items.title: Is the area safe?
items.question: Is the area safe?
items.answer: Yes, it is a quiet and green neighborhood.

items.title: Where is Europaplatz?
items.question: Where is Europaplatz?
items.answer: In the southwest of Stuttgart, 9 minutes from the airport.

items.title: Where is Hildesheim?
items.question: Where is Hildesheim?
items.answer: In the state of Lower Saxony, 15 km from Hanover, 15 km from Salzgitter, 30 km from Braunschweig. Close to the A7 highway, at the intersection of 4 federal highways.

items.title: Bed & Bedroom
items.question: What is Bed & Bedroom?
items.answer: Large double bed, high-quality mattress, bed linen included and regular change. Built-in wardrobe. Extra/child/baby bed available upon request.

items.title: Living Room
items.question: What is Living Room?
items.answer: High-quality furniture. Smart TV (satellite: international channels). Sofa bed.

items.title: Kitchen (all locations)
items.question: What is Kitchen (all locations)?
items.answer: Dishwasher, coffee machine, microwave, rice cooker, Indian chapati board, complete cutlery/plate/glass set, shopping cart.

items.title: Balcony / Terrace
items.question: What is Balcony / Terrace?
items.answer: Furnished balcony or terrace in all apartments.

items.title: Curtains
items.question: What are Curtains?
items.answer: Heat-resistant blackout curtains.

items.title: Wi-Fi & Internet
items.question: What is Wi-Fi & Internet?
items.answer: Free Wi-Fi + DSL connection. (Europaplatz: separate modem in each room)

items.title: Phone
items.question: What is Phone?
items.answer: Private line with unlimited free calls to the German landline.

items.title: Laundry
items.question: What is laundry?
items.answer: Flamingo & Europaplatz: shared laundry room (free). Hildesheim: washing machine + dryer in the apartment.

items.title: Iron
items.question: What is iron?
items.answer: Each apartment has an iron and ironing board.

items.answer: Residence registration (Meldebestätigung / Wohnungsbescheinigung) is provided at all locations.

items.answer: A name plate is placed on the door on the day of move-in.

items.answer: Covered bicycle parking.

items.answer: Monthly guest acceptance with an additional fee of only 10 €/person.

items.answer: Possible upon request and approval: +49 152 064 19253

items.title: Parking

items.answer: Open parking or closed garage available at all locations upon request.

items.answer: Modern Smart TV (with international channels via satellite system). Sofa can be converted into a bed.

items.question: What is the bedroom for Hildesheim?
items.answer: Large double bed, high-quality mattress. Built-in wardrobe. Additional bed available upon request.

items.title: Balcony / Terrace
items.question: What is the balcony / terrace for Hildesheim?
items.answer: Furnished balcony or terrace is available.

items.title: Wi-Fi & Internet
items.question: What is the Wi-Fi & internet for Hildesheim?
items.answer: Free Wi-Fi and DSL connection.

items.title: Phone
items.question: What is the phone for Hildesheim?
items.answer: Private line with unlimited free calls to German landline.

items.title: Laundry
items.question: What is the laundry for Hildesheim?
items.answer: Washing machine and dryer in the apartment.

items.title: Child-Friendly
items.question: What is the child-friendly feature for Hildesheim?
items.answer: Playground in front of the door, baby/child bed can be added upon request.

items.title: Pets
items.question: What are the pet policies for Hildesheim?
items.answer: Possible on request: +49 152 064 19253

items.title: Guest visit
items.question: What are the guest visit policies for Hildesheim?
items.answer: Guests can be accepted with an additional fee of 10 €/person per month.

items.title: Cleaning & maintenance service
items.question: What are the cleaning and maintenance services for Hildesheim?
items.answer: Optional: Facility service, cleaning service, or service-free living options.

items.title: Registration
items.question: What is the registration process for Hildesheim?
items.answer: Yes, support for registration (Meldebestätigung / Wohnungsbescheinigung) is provided.

items.title: Name plate
items.question: What is the name plate policy for Hildesheim?
items.answer: Name plate is ready at the door from the move-in day.

items.title: Multiculturalism
items.question: What is the multicultural environment like for Hildesheim?
items.answer: Multicultural guest structure and its special atmosphere.

items.title: Parking
items.question: What are the parking options for Hildesheim?
items.answer: Open parking or closed garage available on request: +49 152 064 19253

items.question: What is the switchboard number?

items.title: Office Hours

items.title: How many locations are there?
items.question: How many locations are there?
items.answer: There are 3 locations: Stuttgart Flamingo, Stuttgart Europaplatz, and Hildesheim.

items.title: Are the apartments furnished?
items.question: Are the apartments furnished?
items.answer: Yes, all apartments are fully furnished with all the basic necessities for living.

items.title: Do the rooms have a kitchen?
items.question: Do the rooms have a kitchen?
items.answer: Yes, all apartments have a fully equipped kitchen.

items.title: Is there a TV?
items.question: Is there a TV?
items.answer: Yes, there is a Smart TV in the apartments.

items.title: Is there a washing machine in the rooms?
items.question: Is there a washing machine in the rooms?
items.answer: There is no washing machine in the rooms. Shared laundry facilities are available on each floor.

items.title: Is there air conditioning?
items.question: Is there air conditioning?
items.answer: There is no air conditioning. Fans are available in all rooms.

items.title: Is breakfast available?
items.question: Is breakfast available?
items.answer: There is no breakfast service in the hotel. A breakfast voucher can be provided upon request for an extra fee.

items.title: How do I make a reservation?
items.question: How do I make a reservation?
items.answer: 1) Email: reservation@meri-group.de  2) WhatsApp: +49 152 064 19253  3) Web: www.meri-boarding.de  4) Through Booking.com partners

items.title: What is the cancellation policy?
items.question: What is the cancellation policy?
items.answer: Cancellation can be made free of charge up to 3 days before the reservation date.
